member.name: ISyncMgrScheduleWizardUIOperation.InitWizard
member.param: A pointer to a handler ID as a Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrScheduleWizardUIOperation
member.summary: Exposes a method that allows a handler to display the sync schedule wizard for the handler.
